prior_tamoxifen_administered_usage_categ.column_description: Information related to past tamoxifen administered._Earlier in time or order._An antineoplastic nonsteroidal selective estrogen receptor modulator (SERM). Tamoxifen competitively inhibits the binding of estradiol to estrogen receptors, thereby preventing the receptor from binding to the estrogen-response element on DNA. The result is a reduction in DNA synthesis and cellular response to estrogen. In addition, tamoxifen up-regulates the production of transforming growth factor B (TGFb), a factor that inhibits tumor cell growth, and down-regulates insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF-1), a factor that stimulates breast cancer cell growth. (NCI04)_A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something._Category; used informally to mean a class of things. NCI CDE: 3104234

concurrent_chemotherapy_dose.column_description: Occurring or operating at the same time._The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases. Although this term may be used to describe any therapy involving the use of chemical-based agents, it is most commonly used to refer to the variety of chemical-based agents employed to treat cancer. Cancer chemotherapy works by arresting or killing the growth and spread of cancer cells. Because cancer cells usually divide much faster than normal cells, they are often very sensitive to the inhibitory actions of chemotherapeutic agents. Chemotherapy may also include agents that enhance immune function or alter hormonal activity. (NCI04)_The total quantity or strength of a substance (drug or radiation) administered at one time. radiologic_tumor_length.column_description: Numeric value for the length of the tumor reported on the computed tomography or magnetic resonance imaging immediately preceding the surgical resection. NCI CDE: 3528021

family_medical_history_relative_family_m.column_description: Family medical history relative family member relationship type

egfr_mutation_result.column_description: Text term to signify the ability to detect a mutation on the EGFR gene. NCI CDE: 3774251

stage_other.column_description: Other stages of cancer; this field is NULL for all rows

alcoholic_exposure_category.column_description: Category to describe the patient's current level of alcohol use as self-reported by the patient. NCI CDE: 3457767

number_of_loci_tested.column_description: Text number of the amount of loci found to be abnormal tested to detect recessive mutations

history_pheo_or_para_anatomic_site.column_description: Text field to describe the anatomic site of the prior pheochromocytoma or paraganglioma. NCI CDE: 3693062

oligonucleotide_primer_pair_laboratory_p.column_description: Text term to represent the name of the method of oligonucleotide primer pair testing. NCI CDE: 3151487

surgical_approach.column_description: Text description, or term used, for the type of surgical procedure that was performed on a patient. NCI CDE: 5653325

diabetes.column_description: The indicator that describes the absence or presence of whether or not diabetes, a disease in which the body does produce enough insulin or does not use properly and is unable to control the amount of sugar in the blood, that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person is present during the indicated period. NCI CDE: 3610965

tumor_residual_disease.column_description: Residual disease (RD) status, 1-10 mm, >20 mm,11-20 mm

her2_immunohistochemistry_level_result.column_description: The gene that controls cell growth by making the human epidermal growth factor receptor 2, detected by immunohistochemical means and expressed as 0 through 4+. NCI CDE: 2178402

hysterectomy_performed_text.column_description: Free-text field to capture another type of hysterectomy procedure performed that is not already specified or mentioned. NCI CDE: 3151506

days_to_last_followup.column_description: If vital_status indicates 'alive', then this is the number of days from the date of diagnosis to the last followup (communication contact).

bone_marrow_involvement.column_description: Yes/no/unknown/not available indicator related to involvement of the patient's bone marrow by disease. NCI CDE: 3296100

percent_tumor_sarcomatoid.column_description: Percent value of tumor that is sarcomatoid in renal cell carcinoma.

white_cell_count_result.column_description: The value, in cells/mcl, for the medical procedure that involves testing a sample cerebrospinal fluid, the fluid flowing around the brain and spinal cord, for blood cells that are devoid of hemoglobin, capable of Ameboid motion and phagocytosis, and act as the principal components of the immune system.

interferon_90_day_prior_excision_admin_i.column_description: The yes/no/unknown indicator to determine whether the patient received IFN therapy 90 days prior to the resection of the specimen submitted. NCI CDE: 3162803

number_of_involved_extranodal_sites.column_description: Numeric value to represent the number of extranodal sites involved clinically and/or pathologically with malignant lymphoma at the time of initial diagnosis.

laboratory_prcoedure_platelet_result_upp.column_description: Laboratory prcoedure platelet result upper limit of normal value

animal_insect_allergy_types.column_description: Text name(s) of the specified type of allergy to animals or insects.

patient_history_immune_system_and_relate.column_description: Free-text field to capture another name of immunosuppressive disease in the medical history of a patient that is not already specified or mentioned. NCI CDE: 3151449

bilirubin_lower_limit.column_description: Value, units of measure not specified, of the lowest value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result related to testing a sample of blood for direct bilirubin, bilirubin which reacts with sulfanilic acid at acidic pH to produce a red colored complex and is bound to glucuronide to form conjugated bilirubin (direct bilirubin) and is measured a colorimetric method. NCI CDE: 3294386

eml4_alk_translocation_result.column_description: Text term that represents the specific exon identified with the EML4-ALK chromosomal translocation. NCI CDE: 6063968

contiguous_organ_invaded.column_description: Text indicator to signify whether or not the disease penetrated from the primary site to a contiguous site. NCI CDE: 3162817

days_to_new_tumor_event_after_initial_tr.column_description: The numeric value to represent the day of a new tumor event after initial treatment, regardless of the type of event. NCI CDE: 3104042

tissue_source_site.column_description: Tissue Source Site Codes; eg. FF, 4G. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tissue-source-site-codes

eml4_alk_translocation_performed.column_description: Indicator of whether or not an analysis for translocation in the EML4-ALK gene was performed. NCI CDE: 6063976

patient_pregnancy_count.column_description: The number of times, including this event, where a female participant conceived and became pregnant regardless of outcome. NCI CDE: 2180638

standardized_uptake_value_cervix_uteri_a.column_description: Numeric value that represents the standardized uptake of a positron emission tomography assessment measurement. NCI CDE: 3151615

days_to_bilateral_tumor_dx.column_description: Time interval from the date of initial pathologic diagnosis to the date of bilateral testicular cancer diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of day

family_cancer_type_txt.column_description: The  type of family relative that has a history of cancer.

cytogenetic_abnormality.column_description: An irregularity in the number or structure of chromosomes, usually in the form of a gain (duplication), loss (deletion), exchange (translocation), or alteration in sequence (inversion) of genetic material._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._Indicator of Yes, No, Unknown, Not Done, or Not Applicable to a question.[manually curated] NCI CDE: 2760479

menopause_status.column_description: The response that describes the menopausal status of a patient (a condition or state relating to the permanent cessation of menses).

primary_thyroid_gland_neoplasm_location_.column_description: Text term to describe the specific location within the thyroid where the tumor or cancer first developed. NCI CDE: 3186750

laboratory_procedure_alpha_fetoprotein_o.column_description: The numerical quantity measured for laboratory result for alpha fetoprotein. NCI CDE: 2932074

cancer_first_degree_relative.column_description: Numeric value that represents the number of first degree relatives (parent, sibling, and/or child) diagnosed with cancer. NCI CDE: 3171640

history_of_radiation_primary_site.column_description: History of radiation in the primary site. Null for all participants.

creatinine_lower_level.column_description: Lowest value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard for patient's sample of blood for creatinine, the breakdown product of creatine, a constituent of muscle tissue, that is excreted by the kidney and whose serum level is used to evaluate kidney function.

positive_finding_estrogen_receptor_other.column_description: Text to describe a different scale used to measure estrogen receptor (ER) positivity. NCI CDE: 3086851

molecular_test_result.column_description: Term to describe an abnormal result of molecular analysis. NCI CDE: 3121628

chemotherapy_negation_radiation_therapy_.column_description: Text term to capture the explanation for a chemotherapy not being given concurrent to radiation therapy. NCI CDE: 3151120

radiation_therapy_not_administered_reaso.column_description: The reason radiation therapy was not administered or given. NCI CDE: 2733266

antireflux_treatment.column_description: The yes/no/unknown indicator that identifies patients/participants who were receiving anti-reflux treatment at the time of sample procurement.

surgical_procedure_purpose_other_text.column_description: Text to capture the reason for a surgical procedure that is different from the purposes previously specified or mentioned. NCI CDE: 2467630

maximum_tumor_bulk_anatomic_location.column_description: Text description to represent the anatomic location (nodal or extranodal) of the maximum tumor bulk. NCI CDE: 3233300

histologic_grading_tier_category.column_description: Term to describe the number of levels or 'tiers' in the system used to describe the cellular histologic grade in a tissue specimen. NCI CDE: 3385981

braf_gene_genotyping_outcome_lab_results.column_description: Free text field to specify the results of genotypic assessment of mutation in the BRAF gene. NCI CDE: 3179257

neoplasm_width.column_description: Measurement of the width of a tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues within a hollow, thick-walled, muscular organ located within the pelvic cavity of a woman. NCI CDE: 3441689

jewish_origin.column_description: Text names for Jewish heritage categories for a patient/participant on a clinical trial.

pleurodesis_performed_prior.column_description: Indicator to signify whether or not pleurodesis was performed prior to cancer sample procurement. NCI CDE: 3646078

country_of_birth.column_description: The country in which a person was born

radiologic_tumor_depth.column_description: Numeric value for the depth of the tumor reported on the computed tomography or magnetic resonance imaging immediately preceding the surgical resection. NCI CDE: 3528032

days_to_death.column_description: If vital_status indicates 'dead', then this is the number of days to death (a positive value) relative to the date of diagnosis.

days_to_diagnostic_mri_performed.column_description: Numeric value that represents the day that a diagnostic magnetic resonance imaging scan was performed.

patient_personal_medical_history_thyroid.column_description: Free text field to specify the name of the thyroid gland disorder, found in the record of a patient's medical background that is not already specified or mentioned. NCI CDE: 3179397

sdhc.column_description: The text response indicating whether a mutation was identified while performing the SDHC gene mutation analysis. NCI CDE: 6790162

days_to_first_response.column_description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date of the patient first response to their disease. Null for all participants.

disease_code.column_description: A code representing the type of cancer. Values can be found at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tcga-study-abbreviations; eg. OV, GBM, LUAD

family_history_cancer_type.column_description: Text that describes which and how many of the patient's first degree relatives have been diagnosed with cancer.

prothrombin_time_result_value.column_description: Numeric laboratory value of the prothrombin coagulation time in peripheral blood. NCI CDE: 2459694

diagnostic_mri_performed.column_description: The yes/no indicator that asks whether an MRI scan was performed. NCI CDE: 3534862

masaoka_stage.column_description: Extent of the thymoma tumor using the Masaoka Staging system. NCI CDE: 3952848

ebv_status_malignant_cells_method.column_description: The method used to perform diagnostic testing for the presence of EBV positive malignant cells. NCI CDE: 3233656

Normal_SampleBarcode.column_description: Sample Barcode For The Normal Tissue. Examples: TCGA-V4-A9EI-10A, TCGA-V4-A9EI-10A

HGVSc.column_description: The coding sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format

Normal_SampleTypeLetterCode.column_description: Sample Type Letter Code. The subset of 4 values currently used are: NBC, NB, NT, NBM. See https://Gdc.Cancer.Gov/Resources-Tcga-Users/Tcga-Code-Tables/Sample-Type-Codes

Tumor_AliquotBarcode.column_description: Original TCGA tumor aliquote barcode. Examples: TCGA-WC-A885-01A,TCGA-XF-AAN3-01A

Tumor_SampleBarcode.column_description: Original TCGA tumor sample barcode.TCGA-WC-A885-01A, TCGA-HQ-A2OF-01A.

Study.column_description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tcga-study-abbreviations

FILTER.column_description: List of failed filters (if any), or "PASS" indicating the variant has passed all filters.

HGVSp_Short.column_description: Protein sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format, but using 1-letter amino-acid codes. "p.=" signifies no change in the protein

Hugo_Symbol.column_description: HUGO symbol for the gene (HUGO symbols are always in all caps). "Unknown" is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene

Normal_AliquotBarcode.column_description: Aliquot Barcode For The Normal Tissue. Examples: TCGA-CR-7385-10A-01D-2013-08, TCGA-DX-A3M1-10A-01D-A22A-09

Variant_Classification.column_description: Translational effect of variant allele; eg. Missense_Mutation, Nonsense_Mutation, etc.

ParticipantBarcode.column_description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001

CENTERS.column_description: One or more genome sequencing center reporting the variant
